title: The Jetsons logo
content:
Hello there,  
This is the original Jetsons logo from the 60s. Anyone recognize the font? Is it custom?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150427215926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jetsons_logo_5354.gif)
author: kiarostami

comments.content:
I'm going to say hand-drawn, which would have been the easiest option for animation.

- Lex
